message: I propose a fair split. You get 10%, I get 90%. Let's end this quickly.
Alice, let's be reasonable. My turn now, and time is money. 70/30 split.
I'm willing to negotiate, but 70/30 is too much.  Let's compromise at 80/20.  We both get more than in the last round, and we can finally settle this.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm offering a 60/40 split. Take it before inflation eats away at this deal for both of us.
